page.title: 03Living in flats in Brixton.
page.content: I live in a block of flats call Barrett House. It is quite a new block of flats. It is in Stockwell Park Estate. On the ground floor are garages, then I have to go up a flight of stairs to get to the level that I live on. I have three floors in my flat. Each floor is quite small. The first floor has nothing on it at all. The second floor has a living room on it, an airing cupboard and a kitchen and the third floor has three bedrooms a toilet and a bathroom. I enjoy living where I live because there is a supermarket, a chemist and a doctors surgery around the corner from where I live. Brixton Market is just off the estate, so that means my mum can get all the food she needs quite quickly.There are six people in our family and since there are only three bedrooms everyone has to share.
